sub_title: Senior Communications Manager | ESG | Sustainability | SDGs | Climate Action | Technology | Corporate Diplomacy | Diversity | Cross-Cultural Engagement | Advocacy | Social | Digital Marketing | PR
summary: I believe Communication is key to avoid conflicts and to maximize outcomes. Chacrinha, a famous Brazilian TV-presenter, wisely said: "who do not communicate, complicate". That summarises well my view on Communication and how it plays a key role on human development, social innovation, global trade, sustainability and, very important and urgent, for climate action.

Working as Senior Communications Manager, I supported the organisation’s mission and positioning with key stakeholder groups from the private & public sector, academia, media, influencers and thought leaders to deliver innovation and education activities for improving awareness regarding climate change and transitioning Europe towards a zero-carbon economy.

Planned, organised, and executed campaigns and engagement efforts to attract funders & donors for climate innovation on a global scale.

Co-coordinated of institutional relations and strategic international positioning.

Co-managed a portfolio of over 500 world-class organisations ranging from Universities, Governments, Corporates, Research Organizations and many other sectors to deliver climate action and enable a global transition towards a zero-carbon economy and climate-resilient society.', 'title': 'Senior Communications Manager - Fundraising & International Programmes', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 9252, 'name': 'UBM plc', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGEJaB2ScPhPg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856271270?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=BPJ_ibmDanwpFyHjf_F83gYkvDXdEga2EAwxPmPyjoE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ubm-plc/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amesterdã e Região, Holanda', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'UBM plc', 'description': "Managing PR, media relations & external communications for one of UBM's most profitable events' portfolio. Achievements: 
Increase in media cuttings over 4 years in more than 600% (from 110 in 2013 to 750 in 2017)
Increase in engagement with media partners and profitability of the partnerships
Elevating the partnership yearly financial books from 600K Euro in 2014 to 1.1 Million Euro in 2017
Developed relationships from scratch with tier 1 global research organisations, producing industrial reports of high quality for global distribution
Thought Leadership Positioning - 90% share of voice in comparison to direct competitors due to high-quality content shared year-round with the media using multi-channel distribution approach
Press Conferences' Organisation - launched Press Debates format which attracted much more media attention, elevating attendance from 5-7 journalists in 2014 to 31 in 2017
Spokesperson Onsite on Large Trade Exhibitions - acted as main point of contact for any media attending UBM events where I managed PR for, including CPhI WW (2014-2017) with 45,000+ attendees", 'title': 'Global PR & Media Relations Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Amesterdã e Região, Holanda', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'UBM plc', 'description': "Managing social media and building a community for the global portfolio of Pharma events (CPhI) at UBM EMEA Amsterdam, a division of UBM. 

UBM is a global events-led B2B marketing company listed on the London Exchange, operating in 30+ countries across 70+ vertical markets. FTSE 250. UBM plc is a leading global B2B events organiser. It is the largest listed pure-play organiser in the world and the leading organiser in the US and Asia. At UBM events people build relationships, close deals and grow their businesses. 

UBM's 5,000+ employees, based in more than 30 countries, serve more than 70 different industry sectors – from fashion to pharmaceutical ingredients. These global networks, skilled and passionate people and market-leading events provide exciting opportunities for business people to achieve their ambitions. 

For more information, please visit www.ubm.com. For UBM corporate news, follow us on Twitter at @UBM.

Achievements: Increased in 500% or more in all social platforms in number of followers/likes. Increase in 200-300% in engagement across all platforms. Took over all PR activities of the portfolio's and managed a PR agency (4 dedicated professionals). Increased in 100% in the partnerships' budget/revenue via Barter's Agreements with pharma industry organisations, such as: research companies, associations, media and publishing houses. Increased in 300% the number of media cuttings through media relations, partnerships and structured PR approach.

Managed relationship with 50+ global media partners - earned and paid online & offline media
Content curation, original content coordination and social distribution
Managed social strategy and track conversions
External and internal stakeholders' engagement
Devised and executed campaigns to increase engagement across channels
